trends: There have been no other sightings in Rio
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Hovering craft with beam of light
divs: sighting detailsi and friends witnessed a hovering craft on the edge of rio, wisconsin. when it hovered over us, a beam of light came down from the craft. we watched the craft for about a 1\2 hour. i don't remeber the craft having any sound. we decided to run to a friends house to get his telescope. when we brought the telesope back to the sight area, as soon as we got it set up and started looking at it, it suddenly zoomed towards the south and was gone in seconds. the paper reported the next day that a military aircraft followed an unidentified aircraft, somewhere in the midwest i believe, and within a short period of time found itself in wyoming or montanta i believe. my friends and i believed at the time that it must have sighted the same craft we had seen.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
